Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved and spotted with an off-white deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with single black-painted hieratic word 'wine'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393145) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393145)
